Actions.Name: Approve pull request
Actions.Description: This operation is used to approve an existing pull request.

Actions.Name: When a new issue is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new issue is added to the given repository.

Actions.Name: When an issue is updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when an issue is updated in the given repository.

Actions.Name: When a pull request is approved
Actions.Description: Triggers when a pullreqest is approved in the specified repository.

Actions.Name: When a pull request is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new pullreqest is created in the given repository.

Actions.Name: When a pull request is declined
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing pullreqest is declined in the given repository.

Actions.Name: When a pull request is merged
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing pullreqest is merged in the given repository.

Actions.Name: When a new commit is pushed
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new commit is pushed to the given repository.

Actions.Name: Create issue
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new issue in the given repository.

Actions.Name: Decline pull request
Actions.Description: This operation is used to decline an existing pull request.

Actions.Name: Get issue by id
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves all information about the given issue.

Actions.Name: Get user by Id
Actions.Description: This operation returns all information about a given user by its id.

Actions.Name: Merge pull request
Actions.Description: This operation can merge a given pull request.

Actions.Name: When a repository is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new repository is created for the authenticated account.
